**Example 1: 示例1**

demo

Input: 

```
tccli wedata DescribeWorkflowCanvasOperators --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ProjectId 1460947878944567296 \
    --WorkflowId f5d1b42f-ed67-11ed-8909-bc97e105ba60
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "Data": [
            {
                "OperatorId": 100028578851,
                "OperatorName": "jaydenjhu"
            }
        ],
        "RequestId": "9295914a-3738-4ed5-9e37-a93168bcf7cd"
    }
}
```
